Tyrael nodded back to his second in command and advisor and looked at
Deathsteel.

Tyrael: Deathsteel, may I introduce General Kaiser, my second officer.
Kaiser, this is Deathsteel, our new warrior.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        "I'm on my way."  He closes the channel and walks groggily to
the 
> tactical display room.  He has to shake his head several times along
the way 
> just to stay focused.  Upon his arrival he nods at Tyrael.  "Major."
 He then 
> takes his customary seat next to the commander.
